short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a stop-watch panel for how long you've been in a tab and overall time on a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a simple stop-watch to track time spent in a url and overall website. The time spent is only on your local browser and you retain complete control of your data. Open-source development Further planned enhancements include toggle-able graph visuals with respect to proportions of overall time spent in websites.
